wordGroup: blood platelet n. 血小板；凝血细胞

sentences.en: A is antibacterial, insecticidal, and inhibitable to platelet-activating factor.
sentences.cn: A 具有抗菌，杀虫作用，并且对血小板活化因子具有抑制作用。

sentences.en: Thrombomodulin can entirely inhibit thrombin and ristocetin-induced platelet aggregation.
sentences.cn: 血栓调节蛋白可完全抑制凝血酶和利斯托司汀诱导的血小板聚集。
